response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional offering that I believe would significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its high value and the impact it could have on you, I propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This price reflects its true worth while also providing a fair margin for us. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this valuable asset yours soon.", "product_price": 12000}
